reqs:
If this course is blocked, then it is full and a waiting list has been opened. Please register yourself in the waiting list, ARTH 300 01W.
Students will be moved from the waiting list into the course, space permitting, in order of registration date. While we hope all interested students will obtain a seat in this class, please be aware that being in the waiting list does not guarentee you will obtain a seat in the class.
This tutorial section is taken in conjunction with ARTH 300. To register in a tutorial section you must first be registered in the lecture.

courseName: Seminar on Methods and Approaches in Art History
description: Theories, problems, and literature in the study of art history. Required of all Major and Honours students in art history.
